name: Every Level is Mythic
description: Makes every level Mythic, so nobody ever complains again.

enabled.name: Enable
enabled.description: Toggles this mod on or off.

mythic0.name: Non-featured Levels
mythic0.description:
0 = No feature
1 = Featured
2 = Epic
3 = Legendary
4 = Mythic.

mythic1.name: Featured Levels
mythic1.description:
0 = No feature
1 = Featured
2 = Epic
3 = Legendary
4 = Mythic.

mythic2.name: Epic Levels
mythic2.description:
0 = No feature
1 = Featured
2 = Epic
3 = Legendary
4 = Mythic.

mythic3.name: Legendary Levels
mythic3.description:
0 = No feature
1 = Featured
2 = Epic
3 = Legendary
4 = Mythic.

mythic4.name: Mythic Levels
mythic4.description:
0 = No feature
1 = Featured
2 = Epic
3 = Legendary
4 = Mythic.
